title: Add link to external Lovable app

requirements.summary: Add a navigation link that opens https://reflect-and-create.lovable.app/ in a new tab
acceptanceCriteria: A clickable link or button is visible in the application interface
Clicking the link opens https://reflect-and-create.lovable.app/ in a new browser tab
The link uses target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' for security

file_operations.description: Add a navigation link labeled 'Reflect & Create' to both the desktop and mobile navigation menus. The link should point to https://reflect-and-create.lovable.app/ with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' attributes. Place the link after existing main navigation items but before the admin dropdown menu to maintain the existing navigation structure.
